column4: can anyone give me a hand with a sound issue? i just did a clean install of jaunty and i have a soundblaster audigy 4 card that worked fine with 8.10...it is recognized in jaunty but i am getting no sound at all
- I had issues with the sound on my eeepc 901 w/ unr - I had to specify the sound device in each app instead of using 'default'
i'm on a desktop...how would i go about changing each app's sound device?
- good question - I guess my sound in general worked, but skype, for example, choked - and I had to go into the skype preferences
